Description.Text: The InterCityHotel Halle- Neustadt is situated in the Halle city centre and just a few kilometres from Tunnelbahnhof Halle-Neustadt railway station, Halle Ost, and the Halle-Messe Convention Centre. Guests can visit many historic sights including the Haendel's Birth House and many more near the hotel and is also within close proximity to all the major transports of the city.||This hotel has to offer a total of 182 guestrooms, which are all fully equipped with the latest amenities to suit and meet the comfort of its visiting guests. Meeting facilities are also arranged by the hotel for its busy business clients travelling on business issues. Many sports and leisure activities are also organised for its precious guests to while away time during their stay.
